title: As Toto Energy collapses, what to do if your energy firm goes bust
text:
Toto Energy has become the 14th energy provider to cease trading in the past 12 months, with its 134,000 customers set to be transferred to a rival firm.

Rising gas prices and increasing competition for customers have been blamed for the repeated failures in the energy industry. Economy Energy, Our Power, Brilliant Energy, Cardiff Energy Supply, Solarplicity, Eversmart Energy and Uttily Energy are among the other firms to close in recent months.

Toto Energy had 134,000 domestic customers. All will be moved to a new provider, which will be appointed by industry watchdog Ofgem, and should not face disruption of their energy supply.

Peter Earl of Compare the Market, the price comparison website,...
